So said  Nitin Verma  on  2002-11-23 

>--Rainsberger 
>
>   great you really sound like me ;-)
>   /me agree to all you points
>
>   Tests are to reduce the amount of effort we have to do on
>integration/debugging/reworks/refactor without tests.

Exactly. Writing tests is also design work.

Crowd: "You XP people don't design -- you jump immediately to code!"
XP Master: "No, grasshopper... we design *with* code."

<snip />
>There is no substitute to hard-work.

"Programming is not typing."
